scripts.clear:nodemod: rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.clear:pods: cd ios && rm -rf build && pod deintegrate && pod clean && pod install && cd ..
scripts.nu:clear: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && yarn run clear:nodemod && yarn run rm:build
scripts.validate: tsc && yarn run lint && yarn run format
